text: Martial Lavaud Célestin (October 4, 1913 – February 4, 2011) was the first Prime Minister of Haïti. He was born in Ganthier and worked as a lawyer. President Leslie Manigat made him prime minister in March 1988. A coup removed Célestin from power on 20 June 1988. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Haiti
title: Martial Célestin
